body_html:
CopyCPUTensorToGPUSync is still being used by RdmaRemoteRendezvous here
I am still studying it, so I avoided changing this call. But if my understanding of the bug was correct it is definitely a risk.

CopyCPUTensorToGPUSync is still being used by RdmaRemoteRendezvous here
I am still studying it, so I avoided changing this call. But if my understanding of the bug was correct it is definitely a risk.
body:
CopyCPUTensorToGPUSync is still being used by RdmaRemoteRendezvous [here](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/verbs/rdma_rendezvous_mgr.cc#L116)
I am still studying it, so I avoided changing this call. But if my understanding of the bug was correct it is definitely a risk.
